imdb.title: Fate/Zero
imdb.plot: Seven chosen mages and their summoned heroic spirits fight against each other to try and win the Holy Grail: a magical device that can grant any wish.

episodes.title: Mion gawa kessen
episodes.plot: The battle between Caster vs other Servants keeps taking turns but Caster is determined to finish what he started. The caretaker is clueless about handling this issue.

episodes.title: Ôgon no kagayaki
episodes.plot: Rider is shifting Caster into his Reality Marble to buy some time. He asks the other Heroes to come up with a plan to finish Caster off. A phone call from Kiri gives them a fighting chance, but it comes down to Lancer making a difficult choice.

episodes.title: Eiyo no hate
episodes.plot: Kayneth visits Risei and asks for his reward for Lancer's role in defeating Caster. Risei agrees to reward Kayneth with a Command Seal, but after receiving it, Kayneth immediately shoots and kills him to ensure that no other Masters can get one.

episodes.title: Dai hachi no keiyaku
episodes.plot: With rules being broke and new players entering the tournament, the remaining Heroes and Masters are entering a new phase of the tournament. What Tokiomi does next will affect everyone.

episodes.title: Tôi kioku
episodes.plot: On an island in the Philippines, young Kiritsugu uncovers the horrible truth about his father's laboratory experiments.

episodes.title: Seigi no arika
episodes.plot: After leaving the island, Kiritsugu began living with Natalia, who trained him to become a mercenary like her and travel around the world as a hired gun.

episodes.title: Asashin no kikan
episodes.plot: Saber is looking for Rider to finish their promised duel while Waver is replenishing Rider's mana. Zouken gifts the ultimate trump card to Kariya to win. Everything doesn't work out as Kiritsugu planned.

episodes.title: Sôrin no kishi
episodes.plot: Kotomine keeps bending the rules while creating a massive deceptive play involving the remaining Masters and Servants. Saber was led to face Rider.

episodes.title: Kono yo subete no aku
episodes.plot: Kotomine makes up elaborate deceptive ploys to deal with the remaining Servants and Masters. Kiritsugu is planning to outsmart Kotomine. The battle of minds between Kiritsugu and Kotomine is going string.

episodes.title: Saihate no umi
episodes.plot: As Kiritsugu and Saber arrive at the theater on separate paths, Saber is attacked by a gun-wielding Berserker in the underground parking lot. Meanwhile, Rider and Waver encounter Archer on the bridge. As they share a final toast before their duel, Rider asks Archer to join forces with him and conquer the world and beyond, but Archer politely declines. Saber manages to destroy Berserker's gun, but is startled to find he knows the exact length of her sword. She ask for his true identity, and Berserker removes his mask to reveal Sir Lancelot, one of Saber's most trusted ...

episodes.title: Saigo no Reiju
episodes.plot: With Kiritsugu and Kirei fighting with all of their skills, Saber finally kills Lancelot where they share one last talk together. As both Kiritsugu and Kirei are about to give each other the finishing blow, a black ooze from the Grail's spreads over them.

episodes.title: Fate/Zero
episodes.plot: Saber destroys the Grail along with the theater before disappearing. As the smoke clears, Kiritsugu bears witness as the Grail's curse pours from the sky, consuming Archer and rapidly flooding through the city, bringing utter destruction to everything it touches.

episodes.title: Eirei shôkan
episodes.plot: The grail war will start eight years later from the birth of Kiritsugu's daughter. Matous and Toushaka family arranged their plans to summon the Holy grail and fulfill their wish. Tohsaka tokiomi made his student Kirei a master for the Holy grail to be as a puppet. Zouken from matous family made his Kariya a master. All the 7 masters then call upon their servants to fight for them to bring the Holy grail home.

episodes.title: Itsuwari no sentan
episodes.plot: Waver has a hard time commanding his Servant Rider Iskander, as Rider is more interested in how the world has changed since his time and intends to conquer it once he wins the war. Saber has formed a poor opinion of Kiritsugu, considering him cold-hearted, but is surprised to see him have a tender moment with his daughter Illya. Saber also admits she admires Kiritsugu and Iri's wishes to save the world, as she also wishes to save Britain.

episodes.title: Fuyuki no ji
episodes.plot: All the servants have been summoned and now it is a game of spy vs spy. Who will be the first to take the initiative in Fuyuki City?

episodes.title: Ma sô no yaiba
episodes.plot: Saber and Lancer face each other to a death battle while their Masters keep themselves hidden. Other Masters and Servants have been watching the whole fight from the very beginning. Soon the fight reaches its climax.

episodes.title: Kyôjû hôkô
episodes.plot: Rider suddenly appears just as the battle with Lancer reaches its climax, much to Saber's consternation. Undeterred, Rider calls out to those observing the fight from the shadows... but it seems he's not the only heroic spirit drawn in by the battle.

episodes.title: Bôryaku no yoru
episodes.plot: A car screams down the moonlit streets of Fuyuki City, with a very happy-go-lucky Irisviel behind the wheel and a slightly unnerved Saber sitting next to her. The evening takes a bad turn when a mysterious shadow darts in front of them.

episodes.title: Makyô no mori
episodes.plot: The rules are altered by the caretaker due to an emergency situation created due to Caster's unethical abuses. The battle between Caster vs other Servants keeps taking interesting turns.

episodes.title: Majutsu-shi koroshi
episodes.plot: Battle rages throughout Einzbern Castle: Kayneth's magical mercury sphere versus Kiritsugu's formidable gun arsenal, Saber and Lancer join forces against Caster in the forest, and Irisviel detects a new enemy as she and Maiya make their escape.

episodes.title: Nushi to jûsha
episodes.plot: Kiritsugu and company are wrapping up after the assault on their castle, and the Einzbern Master decides to ignore Saber's desire to pursue Caster, instead leaving to finish off Kayneth. But Kayneth awakens to find himself bandaged and strapped to a bed.

episodes.title: Rin no bôken
episodes.plot: The mystery of the mass kidnappings in Fuyuki remains unsolved, with more kids disappearing daily. When Tohsaka Rin can't get in touch with her friend Kotone, she braves the darkness and enters the city on her own to search for her.

episodes.title: Seihai mondô
episodes.plot: Rider and Waver, unexpectedly arrive at Einzbern Castle. Rider declares his intention to have a peaceful discussion with her and Archer on the subject of kingship and the wishes they want the grail to grant.

episodes.title: Seihai no maneki
episodes.plot: Hidden in a Fuyuki hotel, Kiritsugu tries plan his next move, but is still at a loss regarding Kirei's motives. Elsewhere, Iry and Saber have moved to a new hideout, but while Iry seems excited about their new location, Saber senses something is amiss...

episodes.title: Kindan no kyôen
episodes.plot: Rider and Caster reconnect with their Masters when they delve deeper into their views. Caster wants to show his Master something he never saw which brought the attention of other Servants.
